name: sylang-diagram-webview
description: Sylang Diagram Webview - Preact-based diagram rendering

scripts.build: echo 'Starting Vite build...' && vite build --logLevel info && echo 'Vite build complete!'
scripts.build:prod: echo 'Starting production build...' && vite build --mode production --logLevel info && echo 'Production build complete!'
scripts.build:test: echo 'Starting test build...' && vite build --mode test --logLevel info && echo 'Test build complete!'
scripts.build:fast: echo 'Starting fast development build...' && vite build --mode development --logLevel info && echo 'Fast build complete!'
